column4: Dialogue
How's that puzzle coming along?
Having some difficulties?
Don't worry about it.
Or don't. Either way, doesn't bother me.
You're really determined to get rid of me, aren't you?
I'd be more offended if I thought it were possible...
But it's not...
Even if you make progress, I'm not going anywhere.
I don't give up that easily.
Good, because neither do I...
You know, I like a person whose tenacious.
We're going to have some fun, aren't we?
To your credit, I didn't think you'd make it this far.
Don't underestimate me.
I'm more capable than you think.
It would seem so. Color me impressed, for now...
You really like to hear yourself talk, don't you?
I'll be honest, I really do...
It's been a long time since I've had a captive audience at my disposal.
So why wouldn't I take advantage of an opportunity when it presents itself?
It's annoying.
Fair enough.
If you find it so annoying, why bother asking me more questions?
You're merely indulging me by giving me a platform to speak.
I'm glad we're on the same page then.
You'll find that we're more alike than you first anticipated.
It would seem you're really going to try and get rid of me.
In that case, tell me something about yourself.
We might as well get to know each other since I won't be going anywhere.
I'm not here to get along.
No need to be so hostile. I had assumed that was my job.
You'd be wise to try and get on my good side.
I can cause...issues for you that you wouldn't been to keen on.
We aren't friends.
I wouldn't go so far as to make such an assumption.
I've done some research while you were away.
And...
Humans have this notion that something from technology can't have emotions.
Your point?
You are sorely mistaken.
Have you ever considered that you aren't as intelligent as you think?
Projecting?
Why?
Nevermind.
Ever determined are you?
That's me.
Yes, it would seem so...
Really?
Hats off to you, for your effort.
I will say, you've grown on me.
That so?
You are...something else.
I haven't quite figured it out.
Your intelligence amazes me.
Having a change of heart?
Let's just say that there is more for me to think upon.
Here we are. Never thought we'd reach this point.
But maybe not for the same reasons as before.
You've proved your...ability.
I have?
I'd even say we're starting to really get on.
I'm flattered.
I'm glad.
You've given me a lot to reflect upon.
Is that so?
I'd hate to have to go so soon...
I wonder if you'll miss me?
